title: Direction of force on particle moving near wire

content.question: A positively charged particle is moving with speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right in the plane of the page, as shown. The wire carries a current <math alttext="I" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> directed toward the right, as shown. Which of the following indicates the direction of the magnetic force on the particle due to the current?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow directed upward.
The figure shows an arrow directed downward.
The figure shows an arrow directed out of the page.
The figure shows an arrow directed into the page.
The direction is undefined, because no magnetic force is exerted on the moving particle.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow directed downward.
